introduction:
Find training courses to qualify to become an approved driving instructor (ADI).

*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
more_information:
The training organisations are on the Driving Standards Agency's official register of driving instructor training - which is sometimes called ORDIT. 

% Some organisations don't offer training for all of the ADI qualifying tests. %

*[ORDIT]: Official register of driving instructor training
*[ADI]: Approved driving instructor
